message.name: LevelTableParentNotFound
message.text: The level {0} makes use of the ''parentColumn'' attribute, but a parent member for key {1} is missing. This can be due to the usage of the NativizeSet MDX function with a list of members form a parent-child hierarchy that doesn''t include all parent members in its definition. Using NativizeSet with a parent-child hierarchy requires the parent members to be included in the set, or the hierarchy cannot be properly built natively.
